short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore Binance Smart Chain smart contracts quickly and effectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pinki Explorer gives you a set of BSC shortcuts for better exploring contract addresses. Highlight and search on the most reliable sources.

**DISCLAIMER: This extension does not protect you from malicious contracts, it only helps you to do your own research as it comes to investing on Binance Smart Chain tokens.**
